definition: interjection of surprise or pain/Oh/Ow/My goodness!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
(sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
Oh! (interjection indicating slight surprise)

sentences.english: Yikes, nowadays with inflation being so crazy, money just depreciates in value every day.
sentences.chinese: 啊哟，现在通货膨胀这么厉害，钱每天都在贬值。

sentences.english: Runs works loose your rope, retrieves the hope already long freedom.
sentences.chinese: 跑啊挣脱你的绳索，找回渴望已久的自由啊哟。

sentences.english: The island canyon scenery looks endlessly, the light vessel has flown Mt.
sentences.chinese: 岛峡风光看不尽啦，轻舟飞过万重山啊哟。

hey/ow/ouch/interjection of pain or surprise
interjection of pain or surprise/also written 哎喲|哎哟
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
to shout/to bawl/to yell (to urge on an animal)/to hawk (one's wares)
sound of crying
(interjection expressing surprise) oh!/wow!
giggle
variant of 咿[yi1]

to cry out in fear
suddenly/unexpectedly

mile (unit of length equal to 1,609.344 m)/old form of modern 英里[Ying1 li3]
